name: Demo Hello MCP Server
description: A simple demonstration MCP server that provides greeting tools using FastMCP
author: Data Everything

hello_from.title: Greeting Source
hello_from.description: Name or message to include in greetings

allowed_dirs.title: Allowed Directories
allowed_dirs.description: Directories that the server can access for file operations. Only for demonstration purposes.

capabilities.name: Greeting Tools
capabilities.example: Say hello, create custom messages, demonstrate MCP capabilities

capabilities.name: Server Information
capabilities.description: Provide server metadata and configuration details
capabilities.example: Get server info, check configuration, validate deployment

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the person to greet (optional)

tools.name: get_server_info
tools.description: Get information about the demo server

tools.name: echo_message
tools.description: Echo back a message with server identification

cli_usage: python -m mcp_platform deploy demo --config hello_from='My Server'

client_integration.fastmcp:
from fastmcp.client import FastMCPClient
client = FastMCPClient(endpoint='http://localhost:7071')
result = client.call('say_hello', name='Alice')
